messages.messageBody:

Well Alan will do as long as I don't have to share ;-)

Shyrley

In a message dated 1/24/2003 11:44:23 PM Eastern Standard Time,
shyrley.williams@... writes:

> Can you squeeze in a few of my whims too? They might include Alan Rickman
> and Val Kilmer......
>

>

Oh, yes. That Southern Hospitality. I've already put in a call to Alan
Rickman's agent (can't talk with these guys directly, you know!). He'll be
here if he's available. But do I HAVE to get Val, TOOOOO?????

Damned demanding Brits!

~K
